DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of three different strengths of an investigational product dosed twice a day over 7 days in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Safety, Tolerability and Pharmacokinetic Study of ABT-102 in Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Males and Females with a condition of general good health. Must be willing to participate in all studyrelated procedures. History of significant sensitivity to any drug. Allergy to soy lecithin, soybeans, soybean oil, or other soybean derivatives. A requirement for medications, vitamins and/or herbal supplements during the study. Pregnant or breastfeeding. History of drug or alcohol abuse. Positive Hepatitis or HIV test. History of certain medical conditions or any uncontrolled medical illness. History of certain gastrointestinal surgeries that may interfere with gastrointestinal motility, PH or absorption. Current participation in another clinical study or receipt of investigational drug within the past 6 weeks.
